attributes.action: To stop smoking in Berwick St James village hall. Especially Emily.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Emily smoking so as she can invest the money saved into buying some more new shoes. Or maybe donate the money saved towards some new curtains for the village hall that do not smell of stale smoke.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
